content: Thank you both <@!211091239112671234> and <vbuterin>. There is a new version 1.1 of oil proposal published yesterday, that attempts to cover the issue with meta-transactions: https://ethresear.ch/t/oil-adding-a-second-fuel-source-to-the-evm-pre-eip-v1-1/7425 we shall also clarify the refunds a bit more in the future versions
